pre_caption: This is a first-person point-of-view tracking shot from the front of a moving vehicle. Initially, the colorful front of the vehicle occupies the center foreground, extending from the bottom of the frame. In the middle ground, other train cars travel on tracks in the bottom left and center, flanked by tall skyscrapers on the left and right. A large white arrow is positioned in the top center, pointing down at the vehicle. As the shot progresses, the camera moves forward and ascends, transitioning to a high-angle aerial view. The cityscape, with its network of tracks and a body of water on the horizon, shifts from the middle ground to the background below. The tops of the skyscrapers, which initially towered over the vehicle, are now seen from above. Throughout the shot, UI elements remain fixed in the corners and bottom of the frame: a minimap and segment counter in the bottom left, a passenger counter in the bottom center, a gauge in the bottom right, and a location marker in the top right.
